price: 14. ir pareigingas savo tėvams ir jis nebuvo nei išpuikęs, nei nepaklusnus (Allahui arba savo tėvams).
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
